io.ddf.ml

Interface ISupportML

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IHandleDDFFunctionalGroup
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MLFacade, MLSupporter, MLSupporter

    public interface ISupportML
extends IHandleDDFFunctionalGroup
    Interface for handling tasks related to Machine Learning

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DDF applyModel(IModel model)
      The DDF is assumed not to have a label column, and the output should not include the feature columns.
      DDF applyModel(IModel model, boolean hasLabels)
      The output by default will not include the feature columns.
      DDF applyModel(IModel model, boolean hasLabels, boolean includeFeatures) 
      List<List<DDF>> CVKFold(int k, Long seed) 
      List<List<DDF>> CVRandom(int k, double trainingSize, Long seed) 
      long[][] getConfusionMatrix(IModel model, double threshold) 
      IModel train(String trainMethodName, Object... args)
      Runs a training algorithm on the entire DDF dataset.

      • Methods inherited from interface io.ddf.misc.IHandleDDFFunctionalGroup

        getDDF, setDDF

    • Method Detail

      • train

        IModel train(String trainMethodName,
           Object... args)
             throws DDFException
        Runs a training algorithm on the entire DDF dataset. If the algorithm is unsupervised, all columns are considered to be features. If the algorithm is supervised, the last column is considered to be the target column
        Parameters:
        trainMethodName -
        args -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        DDFException

      • applyModel

        DDF applyModel(IModel model,
             boolean hasLabels,
             boolean includeFeatures)
               throws DDFException
        Parameters:
        model -
        hasLabels - if true, then the DDF does include a label column
        includeFeatures - if true, then the output should include all the feature columns
